files.name: Dockerfile
files.content:
FROM openjdk:8
ENV TZ=Asia/Shanghai
RUN ln -snf /usr/share/zoneinfo/$TZ /etc/localtime && echo $TZ > /etc/timezone
COPY target/spring-boot-plus.jar /spring-boot-plus/spring-boot-plus.jar
WORKDIR /spring-boot-plus
EXPOSE 8888
ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","spring-boot-plus.jar"]

å‰ç«¯é¡¹ç›®åœ°å€ [VUE3+TS](https://gitee.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus-vue3) #### [GITHUB](https://github.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus) | [GITEE](https://gitee.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus) #### [springboot.plus](http://springboot.plus) ## å¾®ä¿¡äº¤æµç¾¤ ![å¾®ä¿¡ç¾¤](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/geekidea/wechat-group.png) ## ä¸šåŠ¡å’¨è¯¢ ![ä¸šåŠ¡å’¨è¯¢](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/geekidea/service.png) ### ä¸»è¦ç‰¹æ€§ - é›†æˆspring boot å¸¸ç”¨å¼€å‘ç»„ä»¶é›†ã€å…¬å…±é…ç½®ã€AOPæ—¥å¿—ç­‰ - å•ä½“æ¶æ„ï¼Œæ›´å¿«æ›´ç®€å• - æä¾›PCç®¡ç†ç«¯ä¸APPç«¯ä»£ç æ¥å£ - é›†æˆmybatis pluså¿«é€Ÿdaoæ“ä½œ - å¿«é€Ÿç”Ÿæˆåå°ä»£ç : entity/dto/query/vo/controller/service/mapper/xml - é›†æˆSwagger/Knife4jï¼Œå¯è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆapiæ–‡æ¡£ - é›†æˆRedisç¼“å­˜ - é›†æˆHikariCPè¿æ¥æ± ï¼ŒJDBCæ€§èƒ½å’Œæ…¢æŸ¥è¯¢æ£€æµ‹ ### é¡¹ç›®ç¯å¢ƒ åç§° | ç‰ˆæœ¬ | å¤‡æ³¨ -|-|- JDK | 1.8+ | JDK1.8åŠä»¥ä¸Š | MySQL | 5.7+ | 5.7åŠä»¥ä¸Š | Redis | 3.2+ | | ### æŠ€æœ¯é€‰å‹ æŠ€æœ¯ | ç‰ˆæœ¬ | å¤‡æ³¨ -|-|- spring boot | 2.7.18 | Mybatis | 3.5.13 | DAO Framework | mybatis-plus | 3.5.4.1 | mybatiså¢å¼ºæ¡†æ¶ | fastjson2 | 2.0.42 | JSONå¤„ç†å·¥å…·é›† | Swagger | V3 | Swaggeræ–‡æ¡£ | knife4j | 4.3.0 | apiæ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…· | commons-lang3 | 3.14.0 | å¸¸ç”¨å·¥å…·åŒ… | commons-io | 2.15.0 | IOå·¥å…·åŒ… | commons-codec | 1.16.0 | åŠ å¯†è§£å¯†ç­‰å·¥å…·åŒ… | commons-collections4 | 4.4.4 | é›†åˆå·¥å…·åŒ… | hibernate-validator | 6.2.5.Final | åå°å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒæ³¨è§£ | hutool-all | 5.8.23 | å¸¸ç”¨å·¥å…·é›† | lombok | 1.18.30 | æ³¨è§£ç”ŸæˆJava Beanç­‰å·¥å…· | ### [CHANGELOG](https://gitee.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) ### 4. è®¿é—®é¡¹ç›®Swaggeræ–‡æ¡£ [http://localhost:8888/swagger-ui/index.html](http://localhost:8888/swagger-ui/index.html) ![swagger-ui.png](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/spring-boot-plus/img/swagger-v3.png) ### 5. è®¿é—®Knife4jæ–‡æ¡£ [http://localhost:8888/doc.html](http://localhost:8888/doc.html) ![knife4j.png](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/spring-boot-plus/img/knife4j-doc.png) ## files.name: README.md
files.content:
Everyone can develop projects independently, quickly and efficientlyï¼

## What is spring-boot-plus? ### A **easy-to-use**, **high-speed**, **high-efficient**, **feature-rich**, **open source** spring boot scaffolding. > spring-boot-plus is a background rapid development framework that integrates spring boot common development components. ## Purpose > Everyone can develop projects independently, quickly and efficientlyï¼ ## Open source License MIT-License > Any individual or company can conduct secondary development based on this framework for commercial use without authorization! ## Vue Project [VUE3+TS](https://gitee.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus-vue3) #### [GITHUB](https://github.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus) | [GITEE](https://gitee.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus) #### [ä¸­æ–‡æ–‡æ¡£](https://github.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus/blob/master/README-zh.md) #### [springboot.plus](http://springboot.plus) ## Features - Integrated spring boot common development component set, common configuration, AOP log, etc - Maven Project - Integrated mybatis-plus fast dao operation - Quickly generate background code:entity/param/vo/controller/service/mapper/xml - Integrated Swagger/Knife4j, automatic generation of api documents - Integrated Redis Cache - Integration HikariCP connection pool, A solid, high-performance, JDBC connection pool at last. ## Source code directory structure ```text spring-boot-plus â”œâ”€â”€ docs â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ bin â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ install â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ config â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ db â”‚ â””â”€â”€ img â”œâ”€â”€ logs â””â”€â”€ src â”œâ”€â”€ main â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ java â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ io â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ geekidea â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ boot â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ auth â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ common â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ config â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ demo â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ framework â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ system â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ user â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ util â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ SpringBootPlusApplication.java â”‚ â””â”€â”€ resources â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mapper â”‚ â””â”€â”€ static â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ application-dev.yml â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ application-prod.yml â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ application-test.yml â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ application.yml â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ banner.txt â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ ip2region.xdb â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ logback-spring.xml â””â”€â”€ test â”œâ”€â”€ java â”‚ â””â”€â”€ io â”‚ â””â”€â”€ geekidea â”‚ â””â”€â”€ boot â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ generator â”‚ â””â”€â”€ system â””â”€â”€ resources â””â”€â”€ templates ``` ### Project Environment Name | Version | Remark -|-|- JDK | 1.8+ | JDK1.8 and above | MySQL | 5.7+ | 5.7 and above | Redis | 3.2+ | | ### Technology stack Component| Version | Remark -|-|- Spring Boot | 2.7.18 | Mybatis | 3.5.13 | DAO Framework | Mybatis Plus | 3.5.4.1 | mybatis Enhanced framework | Fastjson | 2.0.42 | JSON processing toolset | Swagger | V3 | Api document generation tool | Knife4j | 4.3.0 | Api document generation tool | commons-lang3 | 3.14.0 | Apache language toolkit | commons-io | 2.15.0 | Apache IO Toolkit | commons-codec | 1.16.0 | Apache Toolkit such as encryption and decryption | commons-collections4 | 4.4.4 | Apache collections toolkit | hibernate-validator | 6.2.5.Final | Validator toolkit | hutool-all | 5.8.23 | Common toolset | lombok | 1.18.30 | Automatically plugs | ### Project Link Diagram ![é¡¹ç›®è°ƒç”¨é“¾è·¯å›¾](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/spring-boot-plus/img/system-link.jpg) ### [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) ## Quick Start ### Clone spring-boot-plus ```bash git clone https://github.com/geekidea/spring-boot-plus.git cd spring-boot-plus ``` ### Maven Build > dev environment is used by default, The configuration fileï¼šapplication-dev.yml ```bash mvn clean package -Pdev ``` ## 5 Minutes Finish CRUD ### 1. Create Table ```sql -- ---------------------------- -- Table structure for foo_bar -- ---------------------------- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `foo_bar`; CREATE TABLE `foo_bar` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID', `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Name', `foo` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Foo', `bar` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Bar', `remark` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Remark', `state` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT 'Stateï¼Œ0ï¼šDisableï¼Œ1ï¼šEnable', `version` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Version', `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Create Time', `update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Update Time', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT ='FooBar'; create table foo_bar ( id bigint not null comment 'ID' primary key, name varchar(20) not null comment 'Name', foo varchar(100) null comment 'Foo', bar varchar(100) null comment 'Bar', remark varchar(200) null comment 'Remark', status tinyint(1) default 1 not null comment 'Statusï¼Œ0ï¼šDisableï¼Œ1ï¼šEnable', create_time timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP null comment 'Create Time', update_time timestamp null comment 'Update Time' ) comment 'FooBar'; -- ---------------------------- -- Records of foo_bar -- ---------------------------- INSERT INTO foo_bar (id, name, foo, bar, remark, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (1, 'FooBar', 'Foo', 'Bar', null, 1, '2023-07-01 21:01:10', null); ``` ### 2. Generator CRUD CODE > Code generation entry class, in the generator module ```text src/test/java/io/geekidea/boot/generator/Generator.java ``` ```java /** * spring-boot-plus Code Generator Main Class * * @author geekidea * @date 2022/3/16 **/ public class Generator { public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception { GeneratorConfig config = new GeneratorConfig(); // é¡¹ç›®ä¿¡æ¯é…ç½® config.setParentPackage("io.geekidea.boot" ) .setModuleName("foobar" ) .setAuthor("geekidea" ); // è¡¨åç§°å’Œéœ€è¦å»æ‰çš„è¡¨å‰ç¼€ config.setTableNames("foo_bar" ) .setTablePrefix(""); // æ˜¯å¦è¦†ç›–å·²æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ config.setFileOverride(true); // æ˜¯å¦åªæ›´æ–°å®ä½“ç±» config.setOnlyOverrideEntity(false); GenerateHandler handler = new GenerateHandler(); handler.generator(config); } } ``` #### Generated code structure ```text â”œâ”€â”€ controller â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBarController.java â”œâ”€â”€ dto â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ FooBarDto.java â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBarUpdateDto.java â”œâ”€â”€ entity â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBar.java â”œâ”€â”€ mapper â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBarMapper.java â”œâ”€â”€ query â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBarQuery.java â”œâ”€â”€ service â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ FooBarService.java â”‚ â””â”€â”€ impl â”‚ â””â”€â”€ FooBarServiceImp.java â””â”€â”€ vo â”œâ”€â”€ FooBarVo.java â””â”€â”€ FooBarVo.java resources â””â”€â”€ mapper â””â”€â”€ foobar â””â”€â”€ FooBarMapper.xml ``` #### Code Generator Templates > Use Velocity template to generate code, you can customize and modify the code to generate template ```text src/test/resources â””â”€â”€ templates â”œâ”€â”€ addDto.java.vm Add DTO generator template â”œâ”€â”€ controller.java.vm Controller generator template â”œâ”€â”€ entity.java.vm Entity generator template â”œâ”€â”€ infoVo.java.vm Detail VO generator template â”œâ”€â”€ mapper.java.vm Mapper generator template â”œâ”€â”€ mapper.xml.vm Mapper xml generator template â”œâ”€â”€ query.java.vm Page Query generator template â”œâ”€â”€ service.java.vm Service generator template â”œâ”€â”€ serviceImpl.java.vm Service implement generator template â”œâ”€â”€ updateDto.java.vm Update DTO generator template â””â”€â”€ vo.java.vm List VO generator template ``` ### 3. Startup Project > Project Main Class: SpringBootPlusApplication [http://localhost:8888](http://localhost:8888) ```text src/main/java/io/geekidea/boot/SpringBootPlusApplication.java ``` ```java /** * spring-boot-plus Project Main Class * * @author geekidea * @date 2022-3-16 */ @EnableAsync @SpringBootApplication public class SpringBootPlusApplication { private static final String BACKSLASH = "/"; public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception { ConfigurableApplicationContext context = SpringApplication.run(SpringBootPlusApplication.class, args); // æ‰“å°é¡¹ç›®ä¿¡æ¯ printlnProjectInfo(context); System.out.println(" _____ _______ _____ _______ _____ _ _ _____ _____ ______ _____ _____ \n" + " / ____|__ __|/\\ | __ \\__ __| / ____| | | |/ ____/ ____| ____|/ ____/ ____|\n" + "| (___ | | / \\ | |__) | | | | (___ | | | | | | | | |__ | (___| (___ \n" + " \\___ \\ | | / /\\ \\ | _ / | | \\___ \\| | | | | | | | __| \\___ \\\\___ \\ \n" + " ____) | | |/ ____ \\| | \\ \\ | | ____) | |__| | |___| |____| |____ ____) |___) |\n" + "|_____/ |_/_/ \\_\\_| \\_\\ |_| |_____/ \\____/ \\_____\\_____|______|_____/_____/ \n"); } } ``` ### 4. Access Swagger Docs [http://localhost:8888/swagger-ui/index.html](http://localhost:8888/swagger-ui/index.html) ![swagger-ui.png](https://geekidea.oss-cn-chengdu.aliyuncs.com/spring-boot-plus/img/swagger-v3.png) ### 5.
